duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise and support the Client & Volunteer Services Supervisor in the client and volunteers support.
Collaborate with the Resource Center Manager on developing and maintaining/enhancing partnerships with agencies and organizations.
Oversee and manage the Resource Desk and associated volunteers and staff.
Support the Resource Center Manager in the creation, implementation, and management of a referral database system.
Participate in evaluation and assessment needs as dictated/needed by the development of the Resource Center.
Oversee and manage SNAP and referral functions, including oversight of employees and participation in community outreach.
Act as account co-administrator for SNAP functions alongside the Resource Center Manager.
Ensure that all work and behavior fulfill core values of Respect, Collaboration, Innovation, Integrity, Accountability, Excellence, and Social Justice.
Continually review internal processes and makes changes to promote operational effectiveness.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Management, or a related field (Master's preferred)
